    • Constructor Detail

      • ItemList

        public ItemList(int left,
                int top,
                int width,
                int visibleItems)
        Default constructor for the item list. Should be noted that the height is determined by how many visible items there are.
        Parameters:
        left - how many pixels from the left
        top - how many pixels from the top
        width - width of the list
        visibleItems - how many items are visible

      • ItemList

                   float partialTicks)
        Description copied from class: Component
        The main render loop. This is where you draw your component.
        Overrides:
        render in class Component
        Parameters:
        laptop - a Laptop instance
        mc - a Minecraft instance
        mouseX - the current x position of the mouse
        mouseY - the current y position of the mouse
        windowActive - if the window is active (at front)
        partialTicks - percentage passed in-between two ticks

      • getItems

        public java.util.List<E> getItems()
        Gets all items from the list. Do not use this to remove items from the item list, instead use removeItem(int) otherwise it will cause scroll issues.
        Returns:
        the items
